entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
